title: Software Developer
description:
• Led code reviews and guided junior developers.
• Streamlined processes with automation tools and real-time webhooks.
• Optimized I/O operations using asynchronous programming.
• Handled third-party integrations and APIs for smooth system connectivity.
• Managed MongoDB and Redis, ensuring data integrity.

title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
description:
Worked on Next.js Web Applications:
• Built dynamic web apps using server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG).
• Integrated third-party APIs & CMS to developed dynamic, heavily customizable and responsive user interfaces.
Developed Pdf Word Finder Chrome Extensions
• Developed a Chrome extension for advanced word search in PDFs using Express-PDF.
• Created efficient search algorithms and user-friendly interfaces.
Developed WhatsApp Web Extension
• Built a WhatsApp Web extension for automated messaging using whatsapp-web.js and Baileys.
• Focused on secure data handling and enhanced user interaction.

title: Web Developer
description:
• As a Web Developer in this company, my responsibility is to write scripts (Typescript) to build dynamic Shopify apps.
• Implemented cross-browser compatibility strategies to ensure smooth functioning of web apps across different browsers.
• These apps offer extensive customization options to users and seamlessly adapt to different themes (800+ themes).
• These apps are used by hundreds of businesses & rated 4.8+ stars on Shopify app store. • Also, my responsibilities include writing test cases using Jest.

title: Full-stack Developer
description: During my tenure at Grras Solutions, I gained valuable expertise in creating single-page applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js). This comprehensive training empowered me to develop dynamic and interactive web applications with seamless frontend and backend integration. Additionally, I learned how to deploy these applications on cloud services, ensuring scalability and accessibility. This hands-on experience has equipped me to tackle real-world web development challenges and deliver cutting-edge solutions that align with industry best practices.
